meanings.sent1: In Guatemala, you can use quetzales to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for quetzales at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of colorful quetzales!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny quetzales.
meanings.sent5: The sound of quetzales clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: Plural form of quetzal, a type of bird.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of quetzales flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The forest was alive with the vibrant colors of quetzales.
meanings.sent3: The quetzales in the tree seemed to be having a lively conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered like the feathers of a quetzal.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the majestic quetzales took my breath away.
